group_1.textRight: Hey… Now that you mention it,
right after you made your contract,
the two of you were in the same Youth@Association…
And you had no idea the other was a Magical Girl,@yeah?
Sounds like the Instructor figured there was a@chance of it, but…
Before you joined the Wings of the Magius, could@you even fight on your own?

group_1.textLeft: I dunno if I’d call what I did “fighting”…
Whenever I saw a Witch, I’d get so terrified and@stressed that I’d black out…

group_1.textRight: Yet you could still defeat them?
That’s kind of scary…

group_1.textLeft: Uh-huh, uh-huh. And if I fought with other people,@I’d end up hurting them too.
I always used to fight Witches by myself.
Until- until I met the Wings of the Magius, that is.

group_1.narration: “When the number of Witches in Takarazaki dropped,@I went to Kamihama to search for them.”
“I ran into some Feathers from the Wings of the@Magius while chasing a Witch, and we ended up@fighting over it.”
“Actually, I barely remember anything that happened,@so this is what Lady San told me later…”

group_1.textRight: [surround:1032A02][chara:6104:effect_7001_attack02]…AAaaaAAAAAHHH!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:6104:effect_7003_damage02][surround:1032A03][bgEffect:shakeSmall]…!
Th-the heck is wrong with her…?! She came up@from behind me and went ballistic…!

group_1.textRight: If we’re not careful, she might hurt us too…
This is bad. You’re gonna…!

group_1.textLeft: …Gh.. I’ll be fine; just get away from me…!
[flashEffect:flashWhiteSlow2]Aah- aaAAAAAH-!

group_1.narration: “That was when I saw a Doppel for the first time.”

group_1.textLeft: *gasp*…!
Wh-what is that…? It…looks like a Witch…

group_1.textRight: …That’s a Doppel.

group_1.textLeft: Doppel…?

group_1.textRight: Anyway, you should probably scram before you@get dragged in too…!
[flashEffect:flashRed2][se:3001_chara_damage][chara715000:effect_shake][bgEffect:shakeLarge]Ugh… Her Doppel is acting out on its own…!
We have to do something or we’ll all get wiped@out…!

group_1.textLeft: N-no way…!
[chara:103200:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]*gasp*?!

group_1.textRight: That sound…it’s the Instructor…!

group_1.narration: “There, I saw Lady San wearing a white cloak.”
“They called her “the Instructor”. She protected us@with a barrage from her gatling gun, took out the@Witch, and fended off that girl’s Doppel at the@same time.”
“…At the time, I thought to myself that if there is a God,@she’d look like this.”

group_1.textCenter: Drat… My White Feather robe got torn…
I’ll have to request a replacement later…

group_1.textRight: Instructor…!

group_1.textLeft: …Take home the girl whose Doppel came out.
…I need to speak with this one for a moment.

group_1.textRight: Y-yes ma’am…!
La-Lady San…? When did you become a Magical@Girl…?
And what in the world was that Witch-like thing@just now…?!
It looked like it sprouted out of that Magical@Girl…!

group_1.textLeft: Calm down, Miyu. It’s going to be alright.

group_1.textRight: O-okaaay…

group_1.textLeft: I’d caught on that you had become a Magical Girl.
I became one a while before you did.
As for the Witch-like being earlier…
I cannot tell you about Doppels right now.
However, if you come with me to the Wings of the Magius, I’ll explain everything there.
…Are you prepared to learn the truth?

group_1.textRight: …Yes, no matter what it is. As long as it comes@from you!
…I’ll- I’ll-!
I’ll follow you anywhere, Lady San!

group_1.textLeft: …This girl is a friend of mine, Miyuri Yukari.

group_1.textRight: M-m-my name is Miyuri Yukari!

group_1.textLeft: Hehe. You don’t have to be so nervous.
It’s nice to meet you, Miyuri.

group_1.textRight: O-of course! It’s nice to meet you too!

group_1.textLeft: …So when you get excessively nervous,
you lose consciousness,
during which time you’ll fight Witches without@any regard for those around you.
…That’s quite an issue, isn’t it?

group_1.textRight: It is, which is why we came to you for advice…

group_1.textLeft: Ah, I see… You’re going to have your hands full@training the Feathers,
so I’ll look after her for a while and see what she’s capable of.
